rainfalls:
Rainfall Advisory No. 2 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Low Pressure Area (LPA)

Issued at: 11:00 AM, 18 June 2025(Wednesday)



Light to moderate with occasional heavy rains are expected over Tarlac, Pampanga, Bulacan and Laguna.



Light to moderate with occasional heavy rains affecting Bataan, Zambales(Botolan, Cabangan, San Felipe, San Narciso, San Antonio, Subic, San Marcelino, Castillejos, Olongapo), Nueva Ecija(Pantabangan, San Jose, Lupao, Carranglan, Bongabon, Rizal, Laur, Gabaldon, General Tinio, Munoz, Llanera, Talavera, General Mamerto Natividad, Palayan, Cabanatuan, Penaranda, Santa Rosa) and Quezon(General Nakar, Infanta, Real) and may affect nearby areas.



The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 2:00 PM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Watch #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 10:00 AM, 18 June 2025



Thunderstorm is MORE LIKELY to develop over Greater Metro Manila Area(Metro Manila, Bulacan, Rizal, Laguna and Cavite) within 12 hours. 



All are advised to continue monitoring for updates.
